snippet.title: JDM: Japanese Drift Master - Release Date Trailer | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
A shortened version of JDM: Japanese Drift Master's upcoming launch trailer, as shown during FGS Live From GDC, revealing the game's release date of May 21st. JDM: Japanese Drift Master is a celebration of Japanese car culture, featuring challenging roads with refined simcade physics, an immersive story told through manga pages, and a vibrant open world inspired by real-life locations. The trailer for Japanese Drift Master showcases in-game capture, manga-based story elements, and lively Eurobeat music. JDM: Japanese Drift Master will release on PC.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #jdmjapanesedriftmaster #gdc

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
